messages.subject: the conference
messages.msgSnippet: JP was fine zipping about on his own and playing with Pam G s boys. PAM G WAS THERE??? Ack!! Tell me how I missed THAT! Geez, I love your posts Pam G....tell
messages.messageBody:
"JP was fine zipping about on his own and playing
with Pam G's boys."

PAM G WAS THERE??? Ack!! Tell me how I missed THAT! Geez, I love your posts Pam G....tell me I DID meet you and I'm just blanking out from seeing so many new faces in such a short time. I feel like a doofus.

As to the correct Heidi, that was Heidi Case that made both the Fairy girl and the "get outa hell free" card, she's one CREATIVE chick! Her email is the "badobilz" one. It gets a bit confusing with all these Heidi's, Kelly's and Pam's!

Ren
